explains: n. 模仿，仿效；滑稽模仿；仿制品，赝品；乐句重复
adj. 人造的，仿制的，伪造的
wordGroup: in imitation of 仿效；模仿
imitation wood 仿制材；人造木

sentences.en: A child learns to talk by imitation.
sentences.cn: 小孩子通过模仿学会说话。

sentences.en: They discussed important issues in imitation of their elders.
sentences.cn: 他们模仿长辈的口气讨论重大问题。

sentences.en: Many corporate methods have been adopted by American managers in imitation of Japanese practice.
sentences.cn: 美国的管理人员效仿日本人的做法，采用了很多经营公司的方法。
